sentence.Network_en: Attach brass valve arm to plastic valve arm with thumbscrew provided. Make sure serrations mesh properly.
sentence.Network_cn: 用所提供的翼状螺丝将黄铜阀门臂附加到塑料阀门臂上.确保锯齿啮合适当.

list.abs: loosen the thumbscrew to release the ball松开拇指螺丝来释放小球

entry.tran: 拇指夹(旧时的一种刑具)
entry.def: A thumbscrew is an object that was used in the past to torture people by crushing their thumbs.
If someone puts the thumbscrews on you, they start to put you under extreme pressure in order to force you to do something.

means.word_mean: 1. instrument of torture that crushes the thumb
2. screw designed to be turned with the thumb and fingers
